TRUDI 2026 is a workshop bringing together users and developers of the Trixi Framework, which
includes the Julia packages [Trixi.jl](https://github.com/trixi-framework/Trixi.jl),
[TrixiShallowWater.jl](https://github.com/trixi-framework/TrixiShallowWater.jl),
[TrixiAtmo.jl](https://github.com/trixi-framework/TrixiAtmo.jl), and
[TrixiParticles.jl](https://github.com/trixi-framework/TrixiParticles.jl). The program will feature
talks, tutorials, and hackathons aimed at consolidating the existing community, aligning long-term
strategy, and advancing key features in high-performance scientific computing.
